format: html
editor: visual
---

## 🧭 Objective:   
Compare economic and social indicators between authoritarian and democratic regimes.

## ✍️ Prompt:  
Which regime type shows stronger development outcomes? What trade-offs are visible?

## 📥 Load Data
```{r}
regimes <- read_csv("assets/datasets/regime_comparison.csv")

ggplot(regimes, aes(x = gdp_per_capita, y = education_index, color = regime_type)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Development Outcomes by Regime Type",
       x = "GDP per Capita", y = "Education Index") +
  theme_minimal()
```
